SEARCH
Package main

Class AthleteGenerator

java.lang.Object
main.AthleteGenerator
public class AthleteGenerator extends Object
The AthleteGenerator Class is used to randomly generate Athletes to be used in the game. This allows the game to populate market lists and opponent teams.

    • generateRandomAthlete

      public static Athlete generateRandomAthlete(int min, int max)
      Generates an Athlete with a randomised name and statistics.
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum value for a stat being generated
      max - the maximum value for a stat being generated
      Returns:
      Athlete a randomly generated Athlete

    • getRandomName

      public static String getRandomName()
      Returns a name randomly picked from the name list.
      Returns:
      the name string at the index of the list

    • getRandomPosition

      public static String getRandomPosition()
      Used when a random position is wanted for an Athlete. Not used in team generation to ensure correct distribution of positions.
      Returns:
      the position string at the index of the list

    • generateTeam

      public static ArrayList<Athlete> generateTeam()
      Generates an ArrayList of 5 Athletes, representing an opponent team
      Returns:
      team

    • generateMarketAthletes

      public static ArrayList<Athlete> generateMarketAthletes(int amount)
      Generates a list of athletes that can be bought from the market.
      Parameters:
      amount - the number of athletes
      Returns:
      marketAthletes an array list of athletes

    • setMinStat

      public static void setMinStat(int amount)
      Changes minStat to the specified amount Not used at the moment but here for future proofing.
      Parameters:
      amount - the number minStat will be set to

    • setMaxStat

      public static void setMaxStat(int amount)
      Changes maxStat to the specified amount Not used at the moment but here for future proofing.
      Parameters:
      amount - setMaxStat to the amount

    • incrementMinMaxStats

      public static void incrementMinMaxStats()
      Increases both minStat and maxStat by 1. This method is called to increase the difficulty of the game as it progresses by increasing the average strength of an opponent team.
